resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81981</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81981</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>3200</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Scissors People Art</string>
            <string language="es">Arte con muñecos de papel desplegables</string>
            <string language="ga">Ealaín le Daoine Siosúrach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schere-Leute-Kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art de Personnes de Ciseaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte Dos Povos Da Tesoura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte Della Gente Delle Forbici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνη ανθρώπων ψαλιδιού</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students cut out scissors shapes drawn on paper or card, and turn them into "Scissors people" by drawing (or sticking) features, clothing, etc., on them. Suitable for students with Moderate Special Needs - senior classes, aged 13+ (or Mild Special Needsl junior/middle classes).</string>
            <string language="es">Los estudiantes cortan formas con tijeras dibujados sobre un papel o una tarjeta y les convierten en “gente desplegable” dibujando (o pegando) características, ropas, etc. en ellos Apropiada para estudiantes con necesidades especiales moderadas – clases d</string>
            <string language="ga">Gearrann daltaí cruthanna siosúr a tarraingíodh ar pháipéar nó cárta, agus déanann siad “daoine siosúracha” astu trí tréithe, éadaí etc. a tharraingt (nó a ghreamú) orthu. Feiliúnach do dhaltaí le Riachtanais Speisialta Mheasarthacha – ranganna sinsearach</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Art</string>
            <string language="es">Arte. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Ealaín</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer schneiden die Schereformen aus, die
auf Papier oder Karte gezeichnet werden und machen sie zu 
"Schereleute", indem sie Merkmale, Kleidung, etc., auf ihnen zeichnen 
(oder haften). Verwendbar für Kursteilnehmer mit gemäßigten 
speziellen Notwendigkeiten - ältere Kategorien, gealtertes 13+ (oder 
mildes spezielles Needsl klassifiziert junior/middle).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants coupent des formes de ciseaux 
dessinées sur le papier ou la carte, et les transforment en 
"personnes de Ciseaux" en dessinant (ou le collage) les 
dispositifs, habillement, etc., sur eux. Approprié aux 
étudiants avec les besoins spéciaux modérés - classes aînées, 
13+ âgé (ou Needsl spécial doux junior/middle classe).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes cortam as formas da tesoura 
desenhadas no papel ou no cartão, e giram-nos da "em povos tesoura" 
desenhando (ou furando) as características, roupa, etc., nelas. 
Apropriado para estudantes com necessidades especiais moderadas 
- classes sênior, 13+ envelhecido (ou Needsl especial suave 
junior/middle classifica).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi tagliano le figure delle forbici 
dissipate su carta o sulla scheda e le trasformano in "la gente delle 
forbici" dissipando (o attaccando) le caratteristiche, vestiti, ecc., 
su loro. Adatto ad allievi con i bisogni speciali moderati - 
codici categoria maggiori, 13+ invecchiato (o Needsl speciale delicato
junior/middle classifica).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές αποκόβουν τις μορφές ψαλιδιού που 
επισύρονται την προσοχή σε χαρτί ή την κάρτα, και τις 
μετατρέπουν σε "ανθρώπους ψαλιδιού" με το σχεδιασμό (ή να 
κολλήσει) των χαρακτηριστικών γνωρισμάτων, του ιματισμού, κ.λπ., 
σε τις. Κατάλληλος για τους σπουδαστές με τις μέτριες 
ειδικές ανάγκες - ανώτερες κλάσεις, ηλικίας 13 + (ή τις 
ήπιες ειδικές κατώτερες/μέσες κλάσεις Needsl).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kunst</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
